com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.properties

Class AbstractStatementMaintainingParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.properties.AbstractStatementMaintainingParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IParameters
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PropertyFileParameters

    public abstract class AbstractStatementMaintainingParameters
extends java.lang.Object
implements IParameters
    An abstract superclass implementation of IParameters that implements the shared logic for the writing and maintenance of statements. Most implementations of the interface use this logic.
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller

    • Method Detail

      • closeWriters

        public void closeWriters()
        Description copied from interface: IParameters
        Close the several supported writers if they are open. Call this method to close writers explicitly rather than by creating new writers through the createWriters() method.
        Specified by:
        closeWriters in interface IParameters
